thread.title: Citigroup Gives CEO Corbat a Big Raise, Up 48% to $23 Million

author: Christina Rexrode
title: Citigroup Gives CEO Corbat a Big Raise, Up 48% to $23 Million
text:
Citigroup Inc. Chief Executive Michael Corbat is getting a big pay raise, a signal that the board supports his efforts to guide the firm past its crisis-era stumbles.
Mr. Corbat is expected to receive total compensation of $23 million for 2017, according to a regulatory filing from the bank Friday. That is his biggest compensation package ever as CEO and a 48% increase from the previous year, when he received $15.5 million.
